content.text: Match ends, Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 2.
Second Half ends, Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 2.
Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Oliver McBurnie (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace).
Foul by Scott Dann (Crystal Palace).
Oliver McBurnie (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Christian Benteke with a headed pass.
Substitution, Swansea City. Angel Rangel replaces Kyle Naughton.
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left.
Timothy Fosu-Mensah (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tom Carroll (Swansea City).
Attempt missed. Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace).
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Swansea City. Oliver McBurnie replaces Tammy Abraham.
Joel Ward (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Joel Ward (Crystal Palace).
Attempt blocked. Scott Dann (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Yohan Cabaye.
Foul by Federico Fernández (Swansea City).
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Scott Dann.
Offside, Swansea City. Wayne Routledge tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.
Attempt saved. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Christian Benteke.
Substitution, Swansea City. Wayne Routledge replaces Mike van der Hoorn.
Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Martin Kelly (Crystal Palace).
Attempt saved. Mike van der Hoorn (Swansea City) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by James McArthur (Crystal Palace).
Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lee Chung-yong.
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Joel Ward.
Attempt missed. Timothy Fosu-Mensah (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by James McArthur.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Joel Ward (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Yohan Cabaye replaces Luka Milivojevic.
Attempt missed. Lee Chung-yong (Crystal Palace) header from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Andros Townsend with a cross.
Foul by Jordan Ayew (Swansea City).
Joel Ward (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Mike van der Hoorn (Swansea City) because of an injury.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 2. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kyle Naughton.
Attempt saved. Martin Kelly (Crystal Palace) header from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jason Puncheon with a cross.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Federico Fernández.
Second Half begins Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Lee Chung-yong replaces Patrick van Aanholt.
First Half ends, Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 0, Swansea City 1. Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Leroy Fer with a cross.
Offside, Swansea City. Tom Carroll tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Martin Kelly replaces James Tomkins because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match James Tomkins (Crystal Palace) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. James Tomkins (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Joel Ward.
Offside, Swansea City. Kyle Naughton tries a through ball, but Tammy Abraham is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Alfie Mawson (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Tom Carroll with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Wayne Hennessey.
Attempt blocked. Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by James McArthur (Crystal Palace).
Sam Clucas (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Andros Townsend.
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luka Milivojevic.
Attempt missed. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luka Milivojevic with a cross.
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Federico Fernández (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace).
Attempt blocked. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kyle Naughton.
Attempt missed. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Tammy Abraham with a cross.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
